text: Rick Blangiardi (born September 15, 1946) is an American television executive and politician. He became mayor of Honolulu in 2021. He is politically Independent.After taking oath of office as mayor, Blangiardi warns road ahead wonâ€™t be easy ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:Mayors of Honolulu Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:Sportspeople from Hawaii Category:American television producers Category:Businesspeople from Hawaii Category:Independent politicians in the United States
